sense.def:
Dying
je sedanji deležnik glagola
to die
.

The dying
so osebe, ki so bolne ali tako hudo ranjene, da bodo verjetno kmalu umrle.

seg.quote: She cared for the poor, the diseased and the dying.

sense.def:
A dying tradition or industry
je tradicija ali industrija, ki postaja manj pomembna in bo verjetno v celoti zamrla.
